Primary Colors: Monochrome matte black, slate grey, olive drab, accents of safety orange.
Texture & Materials: Ballistic nylon, ripstop fabric, waterproof Gore-Tex, heavy buckles, rubberized matte surfaces.
Camera & Lens Specs: 85mm lens for compression; sharp focus on gear details.
Lighting Style: Harsh, overhead fluorescent or cold white street lighting (4000K-5000K).

Primary Colors: Vantablack, deep charcoal, pale skin tones, crimson accents.
Texture & Materials: Distressed leather, heavy wool, latex, layered sheer fabrics (tulle/organza), untreated metal.
Camera & Lens Specs: 35mm film stock with slight grain (e.g., Kodak Tri-X 400); high contrast.
Lighting Style: Rembrandt lighting (strong chiaroscuro); single light source.

Primary Colors: Mismatched plastics (faded beige, cyan), rust orange, copper wire, dirty white.
Texture & Materials: Tangled wires, duct tape, scratched plastic, circuit boards, grease, grime.
Camera & Lens Specs: "Disposable camera" aesthetic; plastic lens soft focus, flash washout, vignetting.
Lighting Style: Direct on-camera flash (harsh and flat).

Primary Colors: Metallic blues, greys, organic fleshy pinks or translucent ambers.
Texture & Materials: Ribbed piping, wet slime, chitinous exoskeletons, fused metal and bone.
Camera & Lens Specs: Macro photography; sharp details on wet surfaces.
Lighting Style: Rim lighting; volumetric fog shafts (God rays).

Primary Colors: Silver, mercury, reflected environment colors (neon blues/pinks), high-gloss black.
Texture & Materials: Perfectly smooth, reflective, viscous fluid, hard polished steel.
Camera & Lens Specs: Wide-angle lens (24mm); polarization filter.
Lighting Style: Multiple point-source lights or HDR environment maps.

Primary Colors: RGB split (red/green/blue offset), neon magenta, cyan, static noise greys.
Texture & Materials: Pixelation, jpeg artifacts, screen tearing lines, databending.
Camera & Lens Specs: Digital sensor clipping; simulated sensor damage; chromatic aberration.
Lighting Style: Strobe lighting; high-speed sync.

Primary Colors: Bleeding colors, muddy transitions between frames, high saturation blocks.
Texture & Materials: Compression artifacts, macroblocking, fluid/melting pixels.
Camera & Lens Specs: Simulated low bitrate video compression; motion blur.
Lighting Style: Shifted hues; lighting that appears to "lag".

Primary Colors: Desaturated NTSC color palette, sepia or green tint.
Texture & Materials: VHS tape noise, scanlines, magnetic distortion, film grain.
Camera & Lens Specs: Low-fidelity camcorder lens; poor dynamic range.
Lighting Style: Flashlight beam in a dark room.

Primary Colors: False color spectrum: White/Red (hot), Blue/Purple (cold), or Green/Black.
Texture & Materials: Grainy sensor noise, lack of surface texture, halo artifacts.
Camera & Lens Specs: FLIR (Forward-Looking Infrared) simulation.
Lighting Style: Emissive lighting (objects glow from heat).
Shot Angle: High-angle surveillance drone view or sniper scope POV.

Primary Colors: Concrete grey, stale white, pitch black shadows.
Texture & Materials: Rough-cast concrete, exposed aggregate, imposing geometric slabs.
Camera & Lens Specs: Tilt-shift lens; deep depth of field (f/16).
Lighting Style: Harsh midday sun or heavy overcast.

Primary Colors: Sepia, oil black, rust red, brass, soot grey.
Texture & Materials: Oily metal, rivets, smoke, leather, grease stains.
Camera & Lens Specs: Vintage lens emulation (Petzval) with swirling bokeh.
Lighting Style: Tungsten warmth mixed with fire/sparks; hazy atmosphere.

Primary Colors: Off-whites, raw canvas beige, stark black stitching, muted industrial greys.
Texture & Materials: Frayed edges, exposed seams, inside-out fabric, raw concrete backgrounds, jagged silhouettes.
Camera & Lens Specs: Macro lens (100mm) for texture detail; shallow depth of field (f/2.8).
Lighting Style: Diffused but directional skylight; cool tones.

Primary Colors: Arterial red, bruised purple, surgical steel grey, pale flesh tones.
Texture & Materials: Wet mucus, exposed muscle fibers, sleek copper wiring, silicone.
Camera & Lens Specs: Macro lens (100mm); extremely shallow depth of field.
Lighting Style: Cold, clinical operating theatre lights (6000K) with red strobes.

Primary Colors: Ivory white, marrow red, matte black carbon fiber, beige.
Texture & Materials: Porous bone, smooth enamel, Voronoi patterns, rigid spinal structures.
Camera & Lens Specs: Portrait lens (85mm); sharp focus.
Lighting Style: Soft, diffused white light (museum lighting).

Primary Colors: Alabaster white, gold filigree, electric blue, deep darkness.
Texture & Materials: Flawless glazed ceramic skin, gold cracks (Kintsugi), glass, robotic joints.
Camera & Lens Specs: Soft focus / "Dream" filter (Pro-Mist); blooming highlights.
Lighting Style: Halo lighting (rim light).

Primary Colors: Radioactive lime green, bioluminescent violet, asphalt black, warning yellow.
Texture & Materials: Slime, thorns, pulsating veins, oily water, moss on concrete.
Camera & Lens Specs: Wide-angle (24mm); high saturation; slight motion blur.
Lighting Style: UV / Blacklight aesthetics; glowing objects.

Primary Colors: High-vis yellow, lime green, hot pink against absolute #000000 black.
Texture & Materials: Vector-sharp lines, dithering patterns, liquid chrome typography.
Camera & Lens Specs: No lens distortion (orthographic feel); ultra-sharp digital rendering.
Lighting Style: None (flat shading) or extreme rim lighting.

Primary Colors: Midnight blue, gold, holographic accents, dark stone grey.
Texture & Materials: Nano-carbon weave, stone carving, glowing circuitry, velvet.
Camera & Lens Specs: Anamorphic lens; horizontal lens flares.
Lighting Style: Bioluminescence; cool blue ambient with warm gold practicals.

Primary Colors: Muddy browns, olive greens, bruised purples, grey skies.
Texture & Materials: Mud, rain-slicked surfaces, blood, rust, battle damage.
Camera & Lens Specs: High ISO noise (grainy); 50mm lens; muted contrast.
Lighting Style: Low key; practical light sources (torches, fires).

Primary Colors: Pale sky blue, grey concrete, overgrown green, faded pastels.
Texture & Materials: Peeling paint, cracked pavement, dry winter grass, rusting equipment.
Camera & Lens Specs: Wide angle (28mm); flat focus.
Lighting Style: Overcast, diffused soft light (shadowless).

Primary Colors: Strictly Black, White, and Blood Red.
Texture & Materials: Ink splatters, halftone dots, brush strokes, stencil spray paint.
Camera & Lens Specs: High-contrast graphic style; sharp focus.
Lighting Style: Illustrative rather than realistic; flat backgrounds.

Primary Colors: High-contrast Black and White (silvery highlights).
Texture & Materials: Cigarette smoke, rain on glass, silk, velvet, wet pavement.
Camera & Lens Specs: 50mm prime lens; soft focus filters (diffusion).
Lighting Style: Hard "venetian blind" shadows; silhouette lighting.

Primary Colors: Red, Black, White, Cream.
Texture & Materials: Paper grain, matte ink, cut-out edges, bold typography.
Camera & Lens Specs: Orthographic projection (no depth perspective).
Lighting Style: None (flat graphic style).

Primary Colors: Inverted tones; metallic cyans, solar oranges.
Texture & Materials: Metallic sheen on skin; halo effects; flat mid-tones.
Camera & Lens Specs: Sabatier effect simulation; high contrast curves.
Lighting Style: Frontal flash that is then tone-inverted.
Shot Angle: Portrait framing; focus on facial topography.

Primary Colors: Jet black, iridescent oil slick, chrome reflections.
Texture & Materials: Spikes, liquid ripples, smooth oily surfaces, sharp jagged edges.
Camera & Lens Specs: High shutter speed; high contrast B&W rendering.
Lighting Style: Multiple point lights for specular highlights.

Primary Colors: Translucent teal, rose quartz, jagged grey rock, pale skin.
Texture & Materials: Sharp geometric facets, raw geodes, skin stretching, refraction.
Camera & Lens Specs: Prism filter effects; light refracting into rainbows.
Lighting Style: Backlighting is essential.
Shot Angle: Detail shots of hands or faces.

Primary Colors: #000000 (True Black), neon cyan/magenta outlines, grey fog.
Texture & Materials: Matte, non-reflective, void-like negative space.
Camera & Lens Specs: Telephoto compression; high contrast curves (crushed blacks).
Lighting Style: Silhouette lighting; bright background.

Primary Colors: Rust orange, bruised blue, dirty white, industrial grey.
Texture & Materials: Corrugated tubes, duct tape, sweat, distressed skin, rusted clamps.
Camera & Lens Specs: Gritty documentary style; "dirty" lens with dust specks.
Lighting Style: Flickering fluorescent tubes (green tint).

Primary Colors: Monochromatic grey scale, muted brown, faint ember orange.
Texture & Materials: Particulate matter, thick dust, torn rags, matte gas mask rubber.
Camera & Lens Specs: Low contrast (flat); high grain/noise; soft focus.
Lighting Style: Flat, diffused; no direct sun.

Primary Colors: Skin tone transitioning into RGB noise; black void; bright error colors.
Texture & Materials: Low-poly geometry, pixelation, wireframe mesh, dissolving sand.
Camera & Lens Specs: Digital distortion effects; data-moshing; perspective errors.
Lighting Style: Mismatched lighting (subject vs environment).
